subject: CNN Alerts: bush

CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
U.S. House education chair wants college lender cuts

06/12/07 02:14 PM, EDT
The Democratic chairman of the House Education Committee Tuesday introduced a bill to slash subsidies to student loan firms such as Sallie Mae and boost student grants.
